creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
text: In his youth, St. Jerome delighted in worldly pleasures but renounced his material comforts to spend many years in the Syrian desert studying and meditating. Here, his half-naked body shows the wear of life spent in the wilderness and the marks of ritual self-punishment, which he inflicted on himself with the stone clasped in his right hand.
title: St. Jerome
